alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Harding County through 715 PM MDT... At 641 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Mud Buttes to 17 miles southeast of Ekalaka. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ladner, Table Mountain and Camp Crook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
